name: Tim Kovacs
content: Tim Kovacs Tim Kovacs Honorary Senior Lecturer in Computer Science Intelligent Systems Laboratory Department of Computer Science University of Bristol I was a lecturer (then senior lecturer) in Computer Science at Bristol from 2001 to 2016, when I retired. Since then I have been an honorary senior lecturer. Research interests Reinforcement Learning Evolutionary Computation Evolutionary Learning Classifier Systems Social Insect Biology Things I've written Google Scholar profile Mischellaneous writing Software Advice on learning and research
